In https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/69185 I am introducing two new lints, which so far used to be part of const_err (so there's no new errors, just existing errors being reclassified): the lints are about overflows and panics being detected by const-prop (not const-eval -- so this is not code that gets executed at compiletime and overflows/panics; this is normal runtime code that however a compiletime analysis determines will overflow/panic).
We're having some trouble picking names, so help would be appreciated:

  • the overflowing one is called overflow so far but that's rather meh. See this discussion.
  • the panic one is called panic so far but that's rather meh. See this discussion.
